sentences.en: But the army says militancy is down to a “subcritical” level.
sentences.cn: 但是军队称交战状态已经降到“临界点以下”的等级。

sentences.en: Full of militancy and revolutionary ardour, the people of all nationalities in the country are working hard for the realization of the four modernizations.
sentences.cn: 全国各族人民意气风发, 斗志昂扬,为实现四个现代化而奋战.

sentences.en: It has been noted that the influence of religious militancy has been growing in the region.
sentences.cn: 我们也注意到宗教极端主义逐渐在本区域扩张影响力.

sentences.en: Out of the ashes of the Suffragette Movement , phoenix - like, a new feminist militancy was being born.
sentences.cn: (宗教就像传说中的凤凰一样, 在战争的灰烬中又复活了. )

sentences.en: They threw themselves into the game with drive and militancy.
sentences.cn: 他们以充沛的精力和斗志投入比赛.

sentences.en: Under conditions of average militancy these ideologies fight elections as coalition blocks.
sentences.cn: 在平均的斗争性情况下,这些相同的意识形态作为同盟来在选举中努力.

words.tran_cn: 富有战斗性的人；好斗者
